parameters.name: X-CHC-TraceId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request

providerBlockedReason.description: The reason that the provider is blocked. Only present when providerStatus is BLOCKED.
The reason that the provider is blocked. Only present when providerStatus is BLOCKED.

code.description: The error code. The format of the error code is CLM-####, where #### is a four digit code representing the type of error.  1024 is the code for a JSON schema validation error, and the schemaValidationErrors property will be populated.

schemaValidationErrors.description: Optional array of objects that contain the fields that have JSON schema validation errors and what the failure is.

field.description: The field with the JSON schema error

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: The member ID. Required if claimGUID is not passed

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: The from date in MM/DD/YYYY format. Required if claimGUID is not passed.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The to date in MM/DD/YYYY format. Required if claimGUID is not passed.

parameters.name: claimNumber
parameters.description: The claim number. Required if memberId is not passed.

parameters.name: claimNumberSource
parameters.description: The claim number source.  Required if memberId is not passed

parameters.name: X-CHC-TraceId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request

lastPaymentAmount.description: The last payment amount in cents

lastPaymentDate.description: The last payment date in MM/DD/YYYY format

code.description: The error code. The format of the error code is MPS-####, where #### is a four digit code representing the type of error. 1024 is the code for a JSON schema validation error, and the schemaValidationErrors property will be populated.

schemaValidationErrors.description: Optional array of objects that contain the fields that have JSON schema validation errors and what the failure is.

field.description: The field with the JSON schema error

parameters.name: X-CHC-TraceId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request

code.description: The error code. The format of the error code is PRQ-####, where #### is a four digit code representing the type of error. 1024 is the code for a JSON schema validation error, and the schemaValidationErrors property will be populated.

schemaValidationErrors.description: Optional array of objects that contain the fields that have JSON schema validation errors and what the failure is.

field.description: The field with the JSON schema error

parameters.name: payerCustomerGuid
parameters.description: The payer customer GUID. Required if obligationType is claim.

parameters.name: claimNumber
parameters.description: The claim number. Required if obligationType is claim

parameters.name: claimNumberSource
parameters.description: The claim number source. Required if obligationType is claim

parameters.name: X-CHC-TraceId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request

code.description: The error code. The format of the error code is TRN-####, where #### is a four digit code representing the type of error. 1024 is the code for a JSON schema validation error, and the schemaValidationErrors property will be populated.

schemaValidationErrors.description: Optional array of objects that contain the fields that have JSON schema validation errors and what the failure is.

field.description: The field with the JSON schema error

parameters.name: X-CHC-TraceId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request

token.description: A token representing the tender in the payment token request

code.description: The error code. The format of the error code is VLT-####, where #### is a four digit code representing the type of error. 1024 is the code for a JSON schema validation error, and the schemaValidationErrors property will be populated.

schemaValidationErrors.description: Optional array of objects that contain the fields that have JSON schema validation errors and what the failure is.

field.description: The field with the JSON schema error

primary.description: Whether or not this is the primary address

payerCustomerGuid.description: The customer GUID representing the payer for the claim. Required if payer is not passed

providerCustomerGuid.description: The customer GUID representing the provider for the claim. Required if the provider is not passed

policyHolderCustomerGuid.description: The insurance policy holder customer GUID for the claim. Required if policyHolder is not passed

patientCustomerGuid.description: The patient customer GUID for the claim. Required if patient is not passed.

serviceToDate.description: The date service was started in MM/DD/YYYY format.

serviceFromDate.description: The date service was completed in MM/DD/YYYY format.

originalClaimAmount.description: The original claim amount in cents

payerPaymentAmount.description: The amount in cents that the payer paid on the claim

patientObligation.description: Patient responsibility to the provider in cents.  No decimals or other currency indicators are allowed (e.g., 100 cents to charge $1.00)

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth in MM/DD/YYYY format

payerAccounts.description: The identifier in the payer's system

providerAccounts.description: Identifiers that identify the consumer in the provider's system. Required if the consumer is a patient

thirdPartyAccounts.description: Array of key value pairs that further identify the consumer in the partner's system

primary.description: Whether or not this contact is the primary contact

npi.description: Provider's NPI. Required when taxId is empty.

taxId.description: Provider's TIN. Required when npi is empty.

addresses.description: At least one address is required

Provider.example:
{
  "providerType": "Hospital",
  "name": "Stanford Hospital",
  "npi": "1245319599",
  "taxId": "02-3421234",
  "serviceNpi": "9876543210",
  "serviceTaxId": "01-2345678",
  "addresses": [{
      "addressType": "Billing Address",
      "addressLine1": "123 Main St",
      "addressLine2": "Apt. 456",
      "city": "Hartford",
      "state": "CT",
      "zip": "94256",
      "country": "United States",
      "primary": true
    }, {
      "addressType": "Mailing Address",
      "addressLine1": "123 Main St",
      "addressLine2": "Apt. 456",
      "city": "Hartford",
      "state": "CT",
      "zip": "94256",
      "country": "United States",
      "primary": false
    }
  ],
  "contacts": [{
      "name": "John Doe",
      "primary": true,
      "contactType": "Fax",
      "contactValue": "123-456-7890"
    }
  ]
}

naicId.description: Required if taxId is not passed.

taxId.description: Required if naicId is not passed.

serviceProviderCustomerGuid.description: Required if the login passed in the authentication header does not correspond to a service provider or to override the service provider associated with the login

submitterCustomerGuid.description: The customer GUID of the submitter of the payment.

receiverCustomerGuid.description: The customer GUID of the receiver of the payment

divisionCode.description: Required if the service provider has more than one division code associated with it

token.description: The token representing the payment card/account

amount.description: The total amount in cents of the payment. Must equal the sum of the amounts from the obligations

obligationGuid.description: The GUID representing the obligation (claim, statement, etc...)

amount.description: The amount in cents of the payment for the oblication

customerGuid.description: The customer GUID that the tender belongs to

firstName.description: The first name of the account holder on the card or bank account.

lastName.description: The last name of the account holder on the card or bank account.

card.description: The credit card. Required if bankAccount not passed.

bankAccount.description: The bank account. Required if card not passed

accountNumber.description: Patient account number (aka Patient Control Number) within providerâ€™s network (CLM01 in 837)

receiptId.description: Critical for CHC to help debug customer issues.  This is the same as receiptId returned as last step of payment workflow.

transactionId.description: Critical for CHC to help debug customer issues.  Combination of transactionId + receiptId makes this unique to a transaction.

paymentAmount.description: Amount of the payment in cents

transactionType.description: The type of transaction - SALE or REFUND.  VOID transactions will never show up - we will never have these returned from the API.

paymentTimestamp.description: The timestamp of the payment execution

accountHolderName.description: For credit card, name on the card, for bank account, bank account holder name.  This is the name provided at time of transaction.

subAccountType.description: Specific form of payment for either a credit card or bank account payment.  Four types for credit card payment types, two types for bank account.  User displayable format returned.

last4.description: Last four digits of credit card or bank account number

refundReasonCode.description: The reason code for the refund

statusHistory.description: A history of the statuses for this transaction

timestamp.description: The date and time that the status occurred for this transaction
